name: user_likes
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool twitter_v2.
Tool description: Twitter public data API for Tweets and users
API description: Fetches the liked tweets of a specified user from the Twitter API using RapidAPI.

user_id.description: The ID of the user for whom to fetch liked tweets.

limit.description: The maximum number of liked tweets to return. Defaults to 40.

cursor.description: The cursor for pagination to fetch the next set of results. Defaults to None.
